RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 7F Turf CR: 87. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 13 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A B red Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEVILS RED chased,driving. ROLL DEM BONES set pace, just missed. MOON HUNTER mild bid. FOREVER POE late interest. THIRD MOON showed little. SHOSHA up close, tired. WHISKEY MOMENT outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 7 1/2F Turf CR: 80. Claiming Purse 10800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE ON THE TURF. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 13 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run ONE MILE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNOWN settled early, rallied, won driving. IMISSBAYMEADOWS set pace, held gamely for place. ISTILLGOTIT blew the first turn going extremely wide, moved to the inside, rallied late for the show. GILLIGAN chased, weakened. RY'S REVENGE no rally. OPEN OUT no factor. HOLY TRUTH in contention, flattened out late. GRAND SIR up close,tired. BULLION outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Gilligan
ENTRY.OWNER: Pesaturo Gus and Joy Kevin J

ENTRY.NAME: Istillgotit
ENTRY.COMMENT: blew first turn, moved to the inside, rallied late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 13 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A B red Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORE LOVE set pace, won easily. RAYMOND chased, second best. GREENRIDGE THUNDER up for show. EL PIQUIN no factor. ALLEN CAN DO IT up close, tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 2F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners At Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 To Carry An Additional 2 lbs. For Each Such Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REJUVENATE broke sharp, drifted out, driving. SKYLAS GOLD second best. THREE MILE LIMIT good effort. ENZOEXPRESS needed more. PERFECT GENTLEMAN no menace. SOMERSET BAY bumped midrace. AW ITE step slow.

ENTRY.NAME: Aw Ite
ENTRY.OWNER: Inman Betty Tunstall Shirley and Tunstall James

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 13, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 13 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Consider ed In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WARRIOR EMPRESS set pace,driving. TALK DIRTY rallied along rail for place. COCO MACHEN chased, weakened late. LIGHT HEARTED no threat. LEADING INDICATOR showed little. CANELITA speed, tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 13 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PASSINGTHEMISTERY sped to the lead, won easily. LOVE GONE WILD chased leader, second best. ULTRA DIVA inside, bested others. FIRST TIME PLAYER saved ground. MISS JOANNIE outrun. MISTY MIDNIGHT brief speed, tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 13 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWILIGHT VISION dueled, repelled bids, driving. BIG TREAT rallied inside. MISS BETTY chased, weakened late. FABRICATE lacked solid bid. MYSTIQUE SABOTEUR showed little. SHARP JUSTICE speed, faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Treat
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAZANNE rallied between horses, swung four wide, driving. MAGIC CALL rallied inside, gained place. THIS ONE CAN RUN dueled, held show. TEAM MOM NOT BRUH rallied. MS EXCUSE no factor. RED DELICIOUS showed little. WOMP speed, gave way. HIGHWAY ROBBERY outrun. LT. LYDIA dueled, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Hazanne
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied between horses, swung four wide, driving
